key.name: available-list
key.description: A list of detected extensions that are compatible with the icon hijacking

key.name: black-list
key.summary: A list of extensions that wont be moved
key.description: A list of extensions for for which icon hijacking is disabled. This is here so we have a persistant list of these when extensions might be disabled.

key.name: display-clock
key.description: Set to false to remove clock from additional monitors

key.name: display-activities
key.summary: Display Activities Button on Secondary Monitors
key.description: Set to false to remove activities button from additional monitors

key.name: display-appmenu
key.description: Set to false to remove appMenus
